https://github.com/StudioSyndiCatCaius/OmegaGameFramework ‍ Overview The
Rimelight Game Framework is an Unreal Engine Plugin designed to contain
major core functionality for the development of games. It follows a
series of internal design patterns and methodologies, and is highly
modular Although primarily developed for internal use within the company
it’s built as highly generic and modular, allowing for external
distribution through a public Git repository. Modules RGF is divided
into two Modules, an editor and a runtime module.
RimelightFrameworkEditor , and is not packaged with the game builds.
RimelightFrameworkRuntime , and is packaged with game builds. ‍ Warning
All Framework classes are declared as Abstract, and are meant to be
subclassed by each game. RimelightFrameworkEditor Asset Import & Export
Data Validation RGF utilizes the Data Validation plugin to ensure assets
have been properly configured once imported. RimelightFrameworkRuntime
Saving & Loading Settings Keybinds Enhanced Input System Input
